p: Another aspect concerns the number of dates. Several authors [ 51, 52] argue that a robust dataset comprises at least 500 dates. With an increase in sample size, the robustness of the model will increase likewise [ 52]. In total, 542 valid dates are available for our study area. When split into regional samples of our three macro regions, the sample size decreases to less than 500 dates; however, as radiocarbon dates are only one argument amongst many in our multi-proxy approach, and a strict quality protocol was exercised, we consider our database robust enough to generate solid patterns that can be cross-checked with additional data.
